name: Unidentified_Ridlay_leader
content: An individual led a group of the resident species on the planet Ridlay. The leader had been alive for the total eclipse on Ridlay fifty years before the following one during the Clone Wars. Though the eclipses were celebrated on Ridlay due to the presence of beings that the planet's inhabitants believed were ghosts, the eclipse during the Clone Wars saw the beings attack the residents, driving them from their homes and into hiding. When Jedi Master Mace Windu arrived on Ridlay to investigate the planet's lack of communications, Ridlay's residents sent Agon to warn him of the ghosts and bring him back to their shelter, where Windu spoke to the leader. Doubting that the beings were truly ghosts, Windu wished to investigate the Ascension Well, where the spirits had risen from, and the leader sent Agon to guide him.
